name: The Night at Jurgjomkle's 3
description:
"At the deepest depths of the Studio, Penny finds herself faced with one last week at the hands of the merciless Jurgjomkle. It's his last stand, and he's not happy about this..."

TNAJ 3 is the final installment of The Night at Jurgjomkles' main story, and with it will come the end. Once again, it offers a new set of challenging gameplay mechanics, and this time there's quite a bit of learning to be done! Can you master the madness of Jurgjomkle and his crazy friends and enemies? Yeah, probably...
